00032 /*
00033  * $Log$
00034  * Revision 1.2  2008/08/11 06:59:59  haraldkipp
00035  * BSD types replaced by stdint types (feature request #1282721).
00036  *
00037  * Revision 1.1  2007/05/24 07:42:42  haraldkipp
00038  * New driver from Przemyslaw Rudy sends modulated infrared remote control
00039  * codes using a simple IR LED. Cool.
00040  *
00041  */
00042  
00043 #ifndef _IRBLAST_H_
00044 #define _IRBLAST_H_
00045 
00046 #include <stdint.h>
00047 
00048 /* IOCTL commands */
00049 #define IRBLAST_SETFREQ  0x0A01   
00050 #define IRBLAST_GETFREQ  0x0A02   
00052 extern NUTDEVICE devIrblast0;
00053 
00054 uint8_t IrblastFreq2Ocr(uint8_t freqKHz);
00055 int IrblastPeriod2Ocr(uint8_t freqKHz, int entries, uint16_t *pCode);
00056 
00057 #endif   /* _IRBLAST_H_ */
